_source.short_desc: Nifty is the ultimate project management hub to keep people, projects, and functions aligned with automated progress reporting.
_source.long_desc:
Nifty is the ultimate project management app to keep people, projects, and functions aligned. With roadmaps, tasks, docs, chats, and automations - Nifty lets your team focus on actual work instead of juggling tools.

Nifty reduces project development cycles and improves team productivity by combining all of the important features of project management into one software. The end result is automated progress reporting that keeps your team and projects on track and budget.
_source.pricing_details:
- Starter: $39/mo for up to 10 team members
- Pro: $79/month for up to 20 team members 
- Business: $124/month for up to 50 team members 
- Enterprise: $399/month for unlimited team members
_source.target_audience: Nifty is geared towards companies of all sizes from SMB's and medium-sized business, to large enterprise organizations.

category_features.name: Agile Methodologies
category_features.definition: Supports XP, Adaptive Project Framework, Kanban, and Scrum

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Cost-to-Completion Tracking
category_features.definition: Forecast of the expenses necessary for project completion

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Gantt/Timeline View
category_features.definition: Coordinates and illustrates a project's benchmarks and dependencies

category_features.name: Idea Management
category_features.definition: Encourages users to organize, discuss, improve, and evaluate insights or alternative thinking

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Kanban Board
category_features.definition: Visualization tool to organize and optimize work/tasks

category_features.name: Milestone Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor task progress and planned accomplishments to better manage project status

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Project Planning/Scheduling
category_features.definition: Define project scope/deliverables, timeline, and resources/budget, along with outlining critical path, dependencies, and constraints

category_features.name: Reporting/Project Tracking
category_features.definition: Reports/dashboards that provide a visual way for managers to understand the status of a task/project, costs, or other key information

category_features.name: Resource Management
category_features.definition: Efficient and effective use of an organization's human capital

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

category_features.name: Traditional Methodologies
category_features.definition: Sequential approach to project development (ie. Waterfall)

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Create Subtasks
category_features.definition: Break tasks down into individual components. Assign users/dates to subtasks.

category_features.name: Gantt/Timeline View
category_features.definition: Coordinates and illustrates a project's benchmarks and dependencies

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Percent-Complete Tracking
category_features.definition: Level of completion within a task

category_features.name: Recurring Tasks
category_features.definition: Set a task to repeat

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Spreadsheet View
category_features.definition: UI looks like a spreadsheet

category_features.name: Task Board View
category_features.definition: UI looks like task board

category_features.name: Time Tracking
category_features.definition: Measure time to completion or hours worked

category_features.name: To-Do List
category_features.definition: UI looks like a physical to do list

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Business Process Automation
category_features.definition: Improve the management of information, tasks, and procedures by establishing routines and patterns associated with processes

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share muliple calendars

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Forms Management
category_features.definition: Organize, store and distribute forms and form templates in a centralized location

category_features.name: Graphical Workflow Editor
category_features.definition: Create, design and modify the flow and processes of tasks in a project

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: No-Code
category_features.definition: Drag and drop/visual interfaces that allow non-tech users to build without writing code

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

category_features.name: Workflow Configuration
category_features.definition: Alter the default workflow to meet your organization's needs

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is where project management happens. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered.

related_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
related_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by millions, Basecamp puts everything you need to get work done in one place.
related_products.features: 89% of our customers say they have a better handle on their business since switching to Basecamp. It bring *everything* you're working together with *all* the tools teams need to get projects done: to-do lists, message boards, schedules, documents & file storage, and group chat. Everyone will know what to do. Nothing will slip through the cracks. You'll always know exactly whats going on.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project.
related_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Teams can start with a project template or create their own custom workflow. Jira issues, also known as tasks, tracks each piece of work that passes through the workflow steps to completion. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a project management tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: GitHub enables development teams to collaborate, and review and manage code within a DevOps pipeline and built-in code security.
related_products.features: GitHub is where the world builds software. Millions of individuals, organizations and businesses around the world use GitHub to discover, share, and contribute software. Developers at startups to Fortune 50 companies use GitHub, every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Manage projects with time tracking, scheduling, budgeting, planning and reporting options in one software available across devices.
related_products.features: Overseeing progress of a project, tracking employees' workload, budgeting and tracking time spent is simple with Clockify. There are no limits on the number of users, projects or time tracking periods. You can invite an infinite number of users to your workspace, approve timesheets & manage schedules. Create invoices, track expenses, control budgets and hourly rates. Generate customized reports, export and share them with clients. Track leaves and holidays and approve time off for your employees

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the world's leading project management tool with fully customizable and proprietary features that make it a must-have.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com--customizable software that adapts to your organization's needs.
related_products.features: Manage all of your team's projects in one place with monday.com. From simple tasks to complex portfolios, this all-in-one software solution allows you to build your team's perfect collaboration tools. Then integrate your other tools; visualize data in calendar, Gantt, or Kanban views; and automate your manual processes. So you can truly take control of all of your workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes project management easier. Keep track of milestones and timelines all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence makes Project Management easier. Use it to track your most complex tasks, keep stakeholders in the loop, and collaborate with all participating team members.  Confluence pages help track project milestones in an organized and concise way. Work better, together with Confluence.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkOtter is "Your #1 Rated PPM for Usability in 2022" - Garnter.  Gantt, Kanban, Resource Mgt, JIRA Sync, MSP Sync, & Magic Dashboards
similar_products.features:
WorkOtter is "the #1 Rated Project & Resource Management Solution for Usability: ~ Gartner May 2022. 

Best for PMOs of 10 or more in Engineering/IT/Innovation ready to move from spreadsheets to easy SaaS project, resource, and portfolios maangement. 

Differentiator:  Unlike Monday, Smartsheet, and Planview you can plan resources at the project level (vs Task).

Top Features: Magic Dashboards, Portfolios (with What-If), Intake, Projects (Gantt/Kanban), Time, Capacity Planning, and Financials.

With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Wrike is versatile project management software for any team, with templates, Gantt charts, automated requests and reports, and more.
similar_products.features: Tackle complex projects with Wrike's award-winning project management software. Break projects into simple steps, assign tasks to team members, and visualize progress with Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and calendars. Manage resource allocation and forecasting with software that's easy to launch. Automation and AI features strip away time-consuming admin tasks so you can do the best work of your life. Streamline your practices, align your team, and ensure you hit deadlines and stay on budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project.
similar_products.features: Jira Software is the project management tool for agile teams, customizable for any type of project. Jira's automation engine enables teams to easily automate tasks and processes. With all project information in one place, reports can also be generated to track progress, productivity and ensure nothing slips.

similar_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
similar_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Quickbase is a no-code operational agility platform that enables organizations to improve operations through insights and automation.
similar_products.features: Quickbase is the easiest way to manage projects in the cloud no matter what the project is or where your teams are. Quickbase's flexible no-code platform gives you all the features you need to assign tasks, automate workflows, and generate insightful reports for even the most complex projects.

similar_products.short_desc: A completely reimagined UI, enhanced search and filters, easywork allocation, new portfolio dashboard, and more to transform your work.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Projects is a cloud based project management software with over 200,000 customers worldwide. It helps you plan your projects, and execute them with perfection. 

With Projects, you can assign tasks easily, communicate effectively with both your team and clients, be informed on all project updates, get detailed reports on work progress and deliver projects on time, everytime.

similar_products.short_desc: Trello is an intuitive project management tool that creates a shared perspective for your team across the entirety of any project.
similar_products.features: Trello is an intuitively simple project management tool, built so users can spend more time getting things done and less time learning how to use this tool. Teams that use Trello can easily organize their work and manage projects from beginning to end: assign tasks, manage due dates, attach files, create checklists, and more. With over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira, and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub for cross-team collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: The collaborative work management leader, helping companies plan, execute, and deliver great work and exceptional customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Adobe Workfront is a collaborative work management solution that addresses the challenges of disconnected teams, siloed tools, and the relentless pace of enterprise work. With Workfront, organizations can manage projects and portfolios with precision using features like task and resource management, capacity planning, Gantt charts, and time tracking. This enables teams to set and meet expectations while minimizing effort, eliminating redundancies, and optimizing delivery on time and budget.

similar_products.short_desc: Visual Planning is a full-scale  Project Management platform configured with project managers in mind. Sign up for a free demo!
similar_products.features: Visual Planning is a full-scale scheduling and project management platform configured with project managers in mind. Monitor employee capacities/skillsets, project statuses, tasks & more with Visual Planning's popular scheduling tools.  Oversee reports, projects, and resources across all devices for a collaborative management platform. Tailor a solution that meets your company's needs.  Sign up for a free custom demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: BigTime is the engine empowering the greatest consulting firms on the planet to budget, track & bill their most important asset: time.
similar_products.features: **Leader in Project Management Software by G2** Track the things that are important to you. Deep dive into project tasks and budgets. Check the status of tasks by due dates, staff assignments and more. If you're operating blind, real-time visibility is a few clicks away and exactly the way you want to see it. "We looked everywhere...nothing beats BigTime" - Matt M.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Client Onboarding software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Client Onboarding tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Client Onboarding Software (also known as Customer Onboarding Software) brings clients through the process of learning and implementing a recently purchased product or service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Idea Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Idea Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Idea Management software provides all employees or members of an organization with a platform for sharing ideas to benefit the organizational mission. This type of software allows companies to solicit information and encourage a collaborative environment for employees. Additionally, vendors, partners, customers and investors can share ideas, allowing companies to collect, sort, and evaluate ideas from the outside workforce, often with strategic goals in mind. Idea Management software is related to Project Management software, Workflow Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Project Management software is used by corporate IT teams and project managers to track task assignments, expenses, and progress of application development, maintenance, and deployment.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Professional Services Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Professional Services Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Professional Services Automation (PSA) software enables the tracking, planning, management and billing of services provided by independent contractors and services organizations. Professional Services Automation applications help to streamline individual projects, prevent loss of revenue and slow billing cycles and manage governance. PSA solutions give an overall view of finances, operations and client relationships, enabling a more efficient organization. Professional Services Automation software is related to Project Management software, Time and Expense software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Portfolio Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Portfolio Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Portfolio Management software makes it easier for project mangers and organizations to analyze and manage numerous projects simultaneously. Project Portfolio Management software helps you allocate resources across projects, and collaborate between project teams. It is designed to help administrators collectively monitor project goals and view reports for multiple projects in one place. Other categories related to Project Portfolio Management software include Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Resource Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Requirements Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Requirements Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Requirements Management software helps companies align practical needs with IT functionality during the systems development or upgrade process. By managing system requirements, companies can shorten development time and optimize the quality of their systems. Requirements Management software usually covers hardware, software, functional, operational, interface, business and security requirements. Requirements Management software is related to Workflow Management software, Server Management software, Project Management software, Website Monitoring software, and Business Process Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Resource Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Resource Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Resource Management software helps project planners allocate program resources. Project managers often use Resource Management software to analyze resource demand and capacity, to create predictive project forecasting. Businesses looking for Resource Management software may also be interested in Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, and Project Portfolio Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Task Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Task Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Task Management software allows groups of users to work together more cohesively to quickly and thoroughly complete projects. Features such as time tracking and project tracking ensure that all project tasks are covered and progress reports are up to date. Other functions include automatic time budgeting and timeline, email syncing, to-do list creation, collaborative interfaces for all users, and task reminders. Task Management software is related to Project Management software, Idea Management software, Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Team Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Team Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Team Management software utilizes integrated communication capabilities and project/task management functionality to assist managers with improving collaboration, communication, and productivity within teams and team-related projects, whether remotely or in the office.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time Tracking software automates the tracking of billable hours. Time Tracking solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time Tracking software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.

Nifty is the all-in-one product roadmapping platform to plan, track, and execute product development with automated progress reporting.

Nifty reduces project development cycles and improves team productivity by combining all of the important features of product management into one software. The end result is milestone-driven progress automation that keeps everyone on your team aligned.
_source.pricing_details:
- Starter: $39/mo for up to 10 team members
- Pro: $79/month for up to 20 team members 
- Business: $124/month for up to 50 team members 
- Enterprise: $399/month for unlimited team members
_source.target_audience: Nifty is geared towards companies of all sizes from SMB's and medium-sized business, to large enterprise organizations.

related_products.short_desc: Trello is a collaboration tool that organizes your projects into boards. In one glance, Trello tells you what's being worked on.
related_products.features: "Organize anything, together." Trello is a collaboration tool that organizes your projects into boards. In one glance, Trello tells you what's being worked on, who's working on what, and where something is in a process. All your projects, all your tasks, all of your team--organized, accounted for, and easily visible at a glance. New users instantly understand the list and card metaphor and can be working on Trello within minutes.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a product roadmap tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 107,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: monday.com Work OS is a customizable, collaborative platform that helps you manage your product roadmaps more efficiently in one place.
related_products.features: monday.com Work OS is a customizable, collaborative platform that helps you manage your product roadmaps more efficiently. Create your product roadmap your way with pre-made and fully customizable templates and powerful features such as automations, integrations, dashboards, and Gantt. Visualize goals, create a detailed plan for every stage of the product's lifecycle, and track progress. Easily coordinate work across your team so everyone is aligned on priorities, and collaborate in real-time.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your projects on track with Confluence. Use our roadmap macro to keep track of project timelines, goals, and more.
related_products.features: Confluence has it all, including roadmaps. Create a page and use our roadmap planner macro as your product roadmap to plan and execute on all of your projects. You can collaborate with developers to set timelines, goals, and much more. Use the roadmap macro to watch your product go from the "in design" phase to the"executed" phase in a clear and concise way. Stay ahead of the game with Confluence.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a product roadmap management software with product launch templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is a product roadmap software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Streamline your product lifecycle management using product launch templates, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, custom request forms with auto-assignment, performance reports, and shared workflows all in one place. Accelerate your product delivery with Wrike's 400+ integrations and visual proofing. Customize your workflows to see progress at every step. Increase your on-time product launch delivery with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: Notion is an all-in-one, customizable workspace. Connect your product roadmap to your tasks, notes, and wiki.
related_products.features: Notion is the only tool that connects your product roadmap to your tasks, notes, and wiki, all in one highly customizable workspace. Tens of thousands of teams and companies around the world use it to keep their employees informed and working together in one place. By bringing all work and knowledge together, Notion creates focus and transparency, while consolidating tools, saving time, and driving more productivity for teams of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: Targetprocess is a visual platform to help you adopt and scale agile across your enterprise.
related_products.features:
Targetprocess is a software tool to visualize and manage Agile projects according to Scrum, Kanban or a custom approach. The tool allows you to manage your product roadmap, manage requirements, track resources, create shared boards and get the transparency you need across teams, projects, and the entire organization.

Recognized in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for Agile Enterprise Planning Tools. Modern & slick user interface. Amazing customer support.

related_products.short_desc: Aha! Roadmaps is the complete product management solution - set strategy, prioritize features, and share visual plans.
related_products.features: Aha! Roadmaps is the complete product management solution. Set your product roadmap based on strategy, resources, and what customers value the most. Score features based on product value to make objective prioritization decisions. Build visual plans to show the timing and scope of critical initiatives, launches, and projects. Create a live dashboard so you can track progress and communicate updates.

related_products.short_desc: Favro brings business agility by empowering teams to work autonomously, while also aligning their planning towards company objectives.
related_products.features: Favro is the world's most agile, cloud-based planning and collaboration platform, where teams can organize themselves around what to do and how to do it, while managers can focus on driving high-level goals and why those goals matter. Teams can use new, smart, and time-saving solutions for team & planning boards, sheets & databases, roadmaps & scheduling, and docs & wikis. Leaders and managers drive the big picture by aggregating the work of teams and teams-of-teams into alignment dashboards.

similar_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.

With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 107,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: productboard helps you decide what should go on your product roadmap and share it with customers and colleagues.
similar_products.features: Productboard is the customer-driven product management system that empowers teams to get the right products to market, faster. It provides a complete solution for product teams to understand user needs, prioritize what to build next, align everyone on the roadmap, and engage with their customers. Productboard is easy to use, enables company-wide collaboration, and integrates into existing workflows. Over 6,000 organizations around the world use Productboard to build excellent products.

similar_products.short_desc: Craft.io is the ultimate Product Management software for PMs who turn new ideas into great products. Start your 14 day free trial!
similar_products.features: Craft.io is the product management tool empowering product managers to do their work from feedback capturing, planning, decision making, roadmapping and more in one purpose-built tool that integrates with most commonly used platforms today. Craft.io becomes the product system of record: the authoritative data source backing up those important product decisions allowing product managers to be more confident, influence stakeholders, and lead with authority

similar_products.short_desc: Canny is a user feedback tool built to cover everything you need to navigate the entire feedback cycle.
similar_products.features:
Capture, organize, and analyze user feedback in one place to inform your product decisions. 

Prioritize feedback, build a roadmap, and close the communication loop with a built-in changelog.

similar_products.short_desc: The first modular product management platform: Discover, learn, plan, and deliver - your way.
similar_products.features:
airfocus offers a modern and modular product management platform.

It provides a complete solution for product teams to manage and communicate their strategy, prioritize their work, build roadmaps and solve the right problems. Designed with flexibility in mind, airfocus allows you to quickly customize the platform to fit your needs without disrupting the way your team works.

Learn more at airfocus.com and start your 14-day trial now.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Sprints is an agile project management tool that helps Scrum teams to plan, track and always be ready for change.
similar_products.features: Zoho Sprints is a free online agile project management tool for Scrum teams. Add user stories to your backlog, estimate and prioritize work items, stay on track with personalized scrum boards and swimlanes, get actionable insights from velocity, burn up and burn down charts, collaborate with your team on a social feed, and schedule your review and retrospective meetings from one place.

similar_products.short_desc: The issue tracker designed for agile teams. An agile project management tool that can be customized to your business processes.
similar_products.features: Developed by JetBrains. YouTrack is a tool to manage your projects, configure agile boards, use reports and Gantt charts, dashboards and time tracking. Track tasks and issues, support customers requests, plan sprints and releases, create workflows, and never force your process to fit the limits of a tool again! YouTrack speaks your language, supports markdown and emoji-reactions. YouTrack is flexible enough to follow your exact process! Cloud or Standalone. Free for 10 users.

similar_products.short_desc: StoriesOnBoard is a visual and collaborative end-to-end product management tool built around story mapping, designed for product teams.
similar_products.features:
StoriesOnBoard helps Product Managers understand customer needs, automate feedback collection, develop feature ideas, prioritize and validate what to develop next with a public roadmap, and rally all stakeholders around the story map. 

Dozens of automated two-way integrations, such as Jira, Trello, and Azure DevOps, facilitate seamless implementation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Lifecycle Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Lifecycle Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software integrates each of the processes required to design, build, deploy and maintain products. Organizations use PLM applications to reduce the time and expenses associated with the development, manufacturing and repair or upgrade of their products. Product Lifecycle Management solutions aid in identifying and implementing cost-saving changes to the manufacturing processes, optimizing design engineering and centralizing supplier and part inventory data. Product Lifecycle Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, MRP software and Quality Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Management software is used by teams to manage the lifecycle of a product from start to finish. Product Management software helps managers create product concepts and development workflows. Since communication is such an important part of product management, it often includes tools to solicit user feedback and team collaboration. Categories related to Product Management software include Product Lifecycle Management, Project Roadmap software, Project Management software, and Requirements Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.
